ai-atk-s0404a31:7_0: And how does a thoroughbred meditate?
ai-atk-s0404a31:7_1: according as it is said: “Amongst those in the face of the shaven quarters such as yourself before, having a lump of wealth, for being king, and caught up in the face, composed with the forehead, their wounds, and is the meaning.
ai-atk-s0404a31:7_2: There is no further existence in the jhāna whose meditation subject is destroyed through the base consisting of boundless space, and so on. He has not conceived in the earth as its object: it is called “the perception of bones”.
